main event: The observer sighted red and white blinking lights which seemed to switch their respective colors in 2 seconds.
interesting points: The observer saw the object moving to the southeast.
The object was described as a solid, glowing (pulsating light) source shaped.
The observer estimated the angular size of the object to be larger than a match head held at arm's length.
The observer reported that the object suddenly sped up and shot away.
The observer had previously seen similar phenomena before.
